content.question: Which of the following should be included in a watershed map to best determine the nonâ€“point source of a pollutant, such as fertilizer, found in a river?

choices.label: The total volume of groundwater in the aquifer
The total area and the average yearly precipitation of the watershed
The land use upstream of the river and water quality indicators in streams that run downstream into the river
The total volume of surface water of the river and the land use downstream of the river

content.answer: The land use upstream of the river and water quality indicators in streams that run downstream into the river

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain environmental concepts, processes, or models in applied contexts.
